segments.text: I can't help but smile at the girl's anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's reaching up, hoping to get a cookie from her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her eyes are wide with excitement, completely focused on the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy trying to balance on the stool, and it makes me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the girl's innocence is so heartwarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't notice the water on the floor or the unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her world is all about those cookies right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they both stay safe and get their treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware of the scene unfolding behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR
